programme.title: Britain's Greatest Bridges
programme.desc: Engineer Rob Bell offers an insight into the history, design and building process of the Britannia Bridge, across the Menai Strait between the island of Anglesey and the mainland of Wales. The difficult task of building the 100ft iron structure was taken up by civil engineer Robert Stephenson and his team, including William Fairbairn and Eaton Hodgkinson. But in May 1970, four youths set light to the famous bridge, and Rob meets a fireman who fought the blaze that fateful night.(n)

programme.title: The Dog Rescuers with Alan Davies
programme.desc: The RSPCA are called to the aid of elderly crossbreed Ben. Although inspector Anthony has been told that Ben is riddled with fleas, the sight that awaits him is enough to shock even an experienced inspector. Meanwhile, in Lancashire, a struggling couple must improve their living conditions or face losing their beloved Bichon Frise for good.(n)

programme.title: The Hotel Inspector
programme.desc: Alex Polizzi heads to Colliters Brook Farm near Bristol, to try to make sense of owner Richard's struggling business and help make his dream a reality. After being forced to run a makeshift B&B from the farmhouse instead of his original plan to renovate an old barn on his property, Richard has been trying hard to get his dream back on track, but crippling debts have led to him being stuck in a rut, with no clear direction. Alex can see huge potential the farm, but getting Richard to pull everything together and maximise his profits proves one of her toughest challenges to date.(n)

programme.title: Big Brother
programme.desc: Daily round-up of highlights, revealing how the housemates are getting on under the all-seeing eye of Big Brother, featuring the latest tasks, games, arguments, laughs, diary room visits and bedroom chit-chat. Narrated by Marcus Bentley.(n)

programme.title: Big Brother's Bit on the Side
programme.desc: Rylan Clark-Neal has the latest developments and invites his studio audience and celebrity guests to discuss how the Big Brother housemates are getting on.(n)

programme.title: Pride and Glory
programme.desc: An NYPD detective's probe into the murder of four cops points to corruption and his own brother and brother-in-law---both of whom are cops. Edward Norton, Colin Farrell and Jon Voight star in this gritty and well-acted tale of duty, honor and loyalty. Noah Emmerich, Jennifer Ehle. Directed by Gavin O'Connor(n)

programme.title: By the Sea
programme.desc: In this intense romantic drama set in 1970s France, a former dancer and her writer husband attempt to revive their marriage by taking a cross-country journey to a small coastal town, where they bond with its quirky inhabitants(n)

programme.title: High Anxiety
programme.desc: A renowned Harvard psychiatrist (with a concealed fear of heights) takes over as director of the PsychoNeurotic Institute for the Very, Very Nervous after the last administrator dies under suspicious circumstances. Mel Brooks directed, co-wrote and plays the head shrink in this homage to Alfred Hitchcock films(n)

programme.title: Singles
programme.desc: Ensemble comedy and romance from six Seattle dwellers on the fringes of the city's music scene. Campbell Scott and Bridget Fonda lead a strong cast in a film directed by Cameron Crowe, the man behind Jerry Maguire(n)

programme.title: The Rookie
programme.desc: A veteran cop breaks in a new partner while trying to break up a car-theft ring after having been taken off the case, leaving his rookie in a quandry over what's right or wrong(n)

programme.title: All the President's Men
programme.desc: Washington Post reporters Bob Woodward and Carl Bernstein investigate a 1972 burglary at the Democratic National Committee headquarters, eventually discovering a cover-up that would lead to President Richard Nixon's resignation. Adaptation of Woodward and Bernstein's book(n)

programme.title: Steve Jobs
programme.desc: This incisive biographical drama—written by brilliant wordsmith Aaron Sorkin—explores the genius and shortcomings of computing guru Steve Jobs in backstage vignettes spanning 14 years, as he and his closest advisers prepare for three different public presentations of era-defining technologies(n)

programme.title: Forgetting Sarah Marshall
programme.desc: In this fizzy, funny take on the classic screwball comedy, Jason Segel ("How I Met Your Mother") stars as a lovelorn composer who flies to a Hawaiian resort in hopes of forgetting the woman who broke his heart (Kristen Bell, "Veronica Mars"). But when he arrives he realizes she and her new boyfriend have just checked in. Mila Kunis, Russell Brand, Bill Hader(n)

programme.title: Fred Claus
programme.desc: David Dobkin's festive comedy stars VInce Vaughn as Fred Claus, the slacker brother of Santa who has grown apart from his more successful brother. But needing to be bailed out of the slammer, Fred calls in a favour and Santa agrees to pay the money so long as Fred comes to Lapland and helps him with the Yuletide rush. And things are even stickier than Fred thought: there's an efficiency expert, Clyde, casting his eye over the operation with a view to closing it down. Can the estranged brothers pull together to save Santa's business? With Kathy Bates as Mother Claus, Miranda Richardson as Annette Claus and Rachel Weisz as Wanda(n)

programme.title: Domestic Disturbance
programme.desc: John Travolta stars in Harold Becker's film as Frank Morrison, the ex-husband of Susan, now married to wealthy industrialist and pillar of the community Rick Barnes. But when her son sees the seemingly placid Barnes kill an ex-colleague, he has to persuade his dad that he and Susan are next in line(n)

programme.title: Everest
programme.desc: In this nail-biting adventure docudrama set in 1996, several groups of climbers successfully scale Mount Everest, only to be faced with tragedy when a monster snowstorm surprises them as they attempt to make their descent(n)

programme.title: The Sum of All Fears
programme.desc: The sudden appointment of a new Russian premier throws America's security forces into confusion, particularly after a biological weapons strike in Chechnya. As the US gears up for war, analyst Jack Ryan races to prove that Russia is still friendly. Thriller(n)

programme.title: Double Impact
programme.desc: Martial arts action thriller in which twin brothers, both expert fighters, are reunited after many years to avenge their parents' murder. After the killing, engineered by their father's unscrupulous business partner, the young sons are separated. One becomes a Hong Kong smuggler, the other a Beverly Hills aerobics instructor. But despite their very different lifestyles, they are united in the desire for justice(n)

programme.title: The Pianist
programme.desc: A gifted classical musician struggles to survive in the Warsaw ghetto during the Holocaust in this harrowing look at Nazi brutality and one man's fight for survival(n)

programme.title: Deepwater Horizon
programme.desc: Riveting docudrama about the Deepwater Horizon disaster, the 2010 oil-rig explosion that resulted in the largest offshore oil spill in U.S. history. The film depicts the challenges that the rig's crew faced as they fought for survival(n)

programme.title: I Am Legend
programme.desc: The film revolves around virologist Robert Neville, who is immune to a man-made virus that was created to cure cancer but has now killed 90% of the human population. He lives in New York and is working on the cure for the virus while defending himself against mutants that have been created by the virus(n)

programme.title: The Family Man
programme.desc: Nicolas Cage is the slick financier who usually wakes up to a blonde and the Wall St Journal. But not today, because angel Don Cheadle gives him a glimpse of what might have been, with kids, a wife and a job selling tires(n)

programme.title: Any Given Sunday
programme.desc: Tense American football drama about an ageing coach holding his team together through a losing streak. Ownership of the team is inherited by a determined young businesswoman who increases the pressure to come up with winning results. When the team's 39-year-old star player is injured and his capable young replacement is more interested in personal glory than team spirit, the coach must reevaluate his life and loyalties(n)

programme.title: Sea of Love
programme.desc: A veteran NYPD detective searching for a dangerous killer stumbles upon a seductive suspect, who may be hiding more than what meets the eye(n)

programme.title: Into the Blue
programme.desc: Into the Blue stars Paul Walker and Jessica Alba as a pair of would-be fortune hunters who look for treasure at the bottom of the ocean after hurricane season. Their happy life in the Bahamas takes a turn when they get a visit from his old childhood friend (Scott Caan and his girlfriend (Ashley Scott). The foursome eventually discover a huge supply of seemingly abandoned cargo in a plane at the bottom of the ocean. They must battle both the bad guys who own the goods, as well as the shark that live in the water(n)

programme.title: Eddie the Eagle
programme.desc: Eddie 'The Eagle' Edwards overcomes all odds and extraordinary challenges to become the first British man to compete in the Olympic ski jump event, making him the most famous ski jumper in the history of Great Britain(n)

programme.title: How to Be Single
programme.desc: Six eligible people in New York City seek for the perfect partner as they learn to be single in a world where the meaning of love seems to change all the time(n)

programme.title: Semi-Pro
programme.desc: Will Ferrell, Woody Harrelson and André Benjamin star in Kent Alterman's sports comedy. Jackie Moon is a musician whose sole chart success earns him enough to buy a professional basketball team. It's 1976 and Moon's team, the Tropics, plays in the American Basketball Association, which is about to merge with the National Basketball Association. But only four teams from the ABA will survive the merger, and Moon is determined not to be left owning a defunct team. As well as earning enough points, they also have to attract at least 2000 fans to each home game, so Moon stages a series of desperate publicity stunts, from the astute to the gloriously insane (and, while this is a loose retelling of the ABA/NBA story, some of these stunts actually happened). Can Moon, his back-from-retirement signing Monix and self-centred but promising youngster Clarence ensure the Tropics' survival?(n)

programme.title: Morgan
programme.desc: A corporate consultant must determine the fate of a mysterious artificial being called Morgan, which has begun evolving at a faster rate than anticipated. When Morgan attacks one of her creators, the group surrounding her are pressed to make a decision(n)

programme.title: Die Hard
programme.desc: New York cop John McClane fights terrorists in an Los Angeles skyscraper in a bid to rescue his estranged wife, who happens to be one of the hostages(n)

But when he arrives he realizes she and her new boyfriend have just checked in. Mila Kunis, Russell Brand, Bill Hader(n)

programme.title: Fred Claus
programme.desc: David Dobkin's festive comedy stars VInce Vaughn as Fred Claus, the slacker brother of Santa who has grown apart from his more successful brother. But needing to be bailed out of the slammer, Fred calls in a favour and Santa agrees to pay the money so long as Fred comes to Lapland and helps him with the Yuletide rush. And things are even stickier than Fred thought: there's an efficiency expert, Clyde, casting his eye over the operation with a view to closing it down. Can the estranged brothers pull together to save Santa's business? With Kathy Bates as Mother Claus, Miranda Richardson as Annette Claus and Rachel Weisz as Wanda(n)

programme.title: Domestic Disturbance
programme.desc: John Travolta stars in Harold Becker's film as Frank Morrison, the ex-husband of Susan, now married to wealthy industrialist and pillar of the community Rick Barnes. But when her son sees the seemingly placid Barnes kill an ex-colleague, he has to persuade his dad that he and Susan are next in line(n)

programme.title: Everest
programme.desc: In this nail-biting adventure docudrama set in 1996, several groups of climbers successfully scale Mount Everest, only to be faced with tragedy when a monster snowstorm surprises them as they attempt to make their descent(n)

programme.title: The Sum of All Fears
programme.desc: The sudden appointment of a new Russian premier throws America's security forces into confusion, particularly after a biological weapons strike in Chechnya. As the US gears up for war, analyst Jack Ryan races to prove that Russia is still friendly. Thriller(n)

programme.title: Double Impact
programme.desc: Martial arts action thriller in which twin brothers, both expert fighters, are reunited after many years to avenge their parents' murder. After the killing, engineered by their father's unscrupulous business partner, the young sons are separated. One becomes a Hong Kong smuggler, the other a Beverly Hills aerobics instructor. But despite their very different lifestyles, they are united in the desire for justice(n)

programme.title: The Pianist
programme.desc: A gifted classical musician struggles to survive in the Warsaw ghetto during the Holocaust in this harrowing look at Nazi brutality and one man's fight for survival(n)

programme.title: Deepwater Horizon
programme.desc: Riveting docudrama about the Deepwater Horizon disaster, the 2010 oil-rig explosion that resulted in the largest offshore oil spill in U.S. history. The film depicts the challenges that the rig's crew faced as they fought for survival(n)

programme.title: I Am Legend
programme.desc: The film revolves around virologist Robert Neville, who is immune to a man-made virus that was created to cure cancer but has now killed 90% of the human population. He lives in New York and is working on the cure for the virus while defending himself against mutants that have been created by the virus(n)

programme.title: The Family Man
programme.desc: Nicolas Cage is the slick financier who usually wakes up to a blonde and the Wall St Journal. But not today, because angel Don Cheadle gives him a glimpse of what might have been, with kids, a wife and a job selling tires(n)

programme.title: Any Given Sunday
programme.desc: Tense American football drama about an ageing coach holding his team together through a losing streak. Ownership of the team is inherited by a determined young businesswoman who increases the pressure to come up with winning results. When the team's 39-year-old star player is injured and his capable young replacement is more interested in personal glory than team spirit, the coach must reevaluate his life and loyalties(n)

programme.title: Sea of Love
programme.desc: A veteran NYPD detective searching for a dangerous killer stumbles upon a seductive suspect, who may be hiding more than what meets the eye(n)

programme.title: Into the Blue
programme.desc: Into the Blue stars Paul Walker and Jessica Alba as a pair of would-be fortune hunters who look for treasure at the bottom of the ocean after hurricane season. Their happy life in the Bahamas takes a turn when they get a visit from his old childhood friend (Scott Caan and his girlfriend (Ashley Scott). The foursome eventually discover a huge supply of seemingly abandoned cargo in a plane at the bottom of the ocean. They must battle both the bad guys who own the goods, as well as the shark that live in the water(n)

programme.title: Eddie the Eagle
programme.desc: Eddie 'The Eagle' Edwards overcomes all odds and extraordinary challenges to become the first British man to compete in the Olympic ski jump event, making him the most famous ski jumper in the history of Great Britain(n)

programme.title: How to Be Single

programme.title: Semi-Pro
programme.desc: Will Ferrell, Woody Harrelson and André Benjamin star in Kent Alterman's sports comedy. Jackie Moon is a musician whose sole chart success earns him enough to buy a professional basketball team. It's 1976 and Moon's team, the Tropics, plays in the American Basketball Association, which is about to merge with the National Basketball Association. But only four teams from the ABA will survive the merger, and Moon is determined not to be left owning a defunct team. As well as earning enough points, they also have to attract at least 2000 fans to each home game, so Moon stages a series of desperate publicity stunts, from the astute to the gloriously insane (and, while this is a loose retelling of the ABA/NBA story, some of these stunts actually happened). Can Moon, his back-from-retirement signing Monix and self-centred but promising youngster Clarence ensure the Tropics' survival?(n)

A DNA sample provides a link to a rebellious teenager, and the team wonders if the killer could be related to him. But a whole new can of worms is opened when investigators discover the lad's mother was raped - could the same person have killed Agnes? Gerry and Steve hope that interviewing her friends from a local chess club may shed new light on the matter, but it's a possible professional issue that could hold the key to unlocking the mystery. Meanwhile, Nick and Schmidt become embroiled in an increasingly heated argument over DIY. Comedy, starring Zooey Deschanel, Lamorne Morris and Jake Johnson.(n)

programme.title: Brooklyn Nine-Nine
programme.desc: Jake is excited to work a case with the best detective in the NYPD, Dave Majors - until his colleague shares his intentions to ask Amy out on a date. Rosa's surprising fashion choice causes a stir, and Charles and Gina make an unexpected discovery. Comedy, with Andy Samberg.(n)

programme.title: Brooklyn Nine-Nine
programme.desc: Holt begins to worry he is being set up for a fall by one of his superiors, and Peralta is handed the chance to work on an important case. Meanwhile, Jeffords tries to make sure his twins get a place at their chosen school. Comedy, with Andy Samberg and Terry Crews.(n)

programme.title: The Big Bang Theory
programme.desc: Sheldon introduces Amy to Raiders of the Lost Ark - one of his favourite films - and is distraught when she ends up pointing out a plot hole that ruins the whole story. Meanwhile, Leonard realises he can manipulate Penny into feeling sorry for him when his mother publishes a reveal-all book about his childhood problems. Comedy, starring Jim Parsons and Johnny Galecki.(n)

programme.title: The Big Bang Theory
programme.desc: Sheldon re-evaluates the time he spends with Amy when she takes a job at the university. Meanwhile, Howard is forced to sleep on his friend's sofa after he gets into an argument with Bernadette. Comedy, starring Jim Parsons, Simon Helberg and Mayim Bialik.(n)

programme.title: How I Met Your Mother
programme.desc: Ted attempts to help a stressed Barney decide which suit to wear on the morning of his wedding. Lily believes that Robin is not treating the most important day of her life with the significance it deserves and the pair argue. Later, the gang watches an embarrassing film. American sitcom, guest starring Tracey Ullman and Jon Heder.(n)

programme.title: How I Met Your Mother
programme.desc: Marshall asks Ted and Barney to help him figure out where Lily went on the night of their argument, and is shocked when he discovers the truth. Meanwhile, Robin is concerned when Barney starts to act like her father did on his wedding day. American sitcom, guest starring Kyle MacLachlan and Tracey Ullman.(n)

programme.title: New Girl
programme.desc: Jess agrees to look after Russell's daughter while he is out of town, and does her best to demonstrate good mothering skills. However, his ex-wife Ouli (guest star Jeanne Tripplehorn) is unhappy with the arrangement. Winston's boss torments him on the way to an important talk-show appearance, Cece is terrified that she might be pregnant, and Nick has to defend his new relationship.(n)

programme.title: New Girl
programme.desc: Jess witnesses an argument between Russell and his ex-wife Ouli (Dermot Mulroney and Jeanne Tripplehorn) and worries that her own relationship with him does not have the same sexual tension. programme.title: 2 Broke Girls
programme.desc: Max is heartbroken when Randy breaks up with her via his therapist, so Caroline rents a party bus in the hope of cheering her friend up. Comedy, starring Kat Dennings.(n)

programme.sub-title: And the Show and Don't Tell.

programme.title: The Big Bang Theory
programme.desc: When the guys are unable to get tickets for the Comic-Con, Leonard, Howard and Raj decide to buy fake passes from a stranger - but they then worry about getting caught with them. Comedy, guest starring James Earl Jones and Carrie Fisher.(n)

programme.title: The Big Bang Theory
programme.desc: Sheldon and Amy take a train ride to the Napa Valley with Howard and Bernadette on Valentine's Day, while Leonard and Penny head to the vets when they volunteer to look after Raj's dog. Comedy, starring Johnny Galecki, Jim Parsons and Kaley Cuoco.(n)

programme.title: Hollyoaks
programme.desc: Darren and Nancy go to visit Kyle, but Nancy is worried about his welfare, while Tom and Alfie get the wrong end of the stick at The Loft and Courtney makes a big decision.(n)

programme.desc: Raj accepts Sheldon's offer to work for him as he is desperate to avoid being sent back to India. Howard starts spending more time with Leonard and Penny, who would rather be left alone. Johnny Galecki, Simon Helberg and Kaley Cuoco star.(n)

programme.title: The Big Bang Theory
programme.desc: Sheldon is given the chance to square off against the one actor from the Star Trek franchise he holds a grudge against - Wil Wheaton. Meanwhile, Leonard asks Penny to set Howard up on a date with one of her friends. Comedy, starring Johnny Galecki and Jim Parsons.(n)

programme.title: Gogglebox
programme.desc: The armchair critics share their opinions on Doctor Thorne, Employable Me, Dogs Might Fly, Tribes, Predators & Me, Line of Duty, Heston's Dinner in Space and the news. First aired in March 2016.(n)

programme.title: Gogglebox

First shown in 2014.(n)

programme.title: First Dates
programme.desc: Eighteen-year-old rookie beautician Ruby returns to the restaurant to dine with 20-year-old trainee auctioneer Adam, while 24-year-old waitress Charlotte is returning to the dating scene after being widowed last year. Will 24-year-old junior stockbroker Jamie be the gentleman she's looking for? Teresa is 66 and hasn't been on a date for 20 years, so hopes James, who loves Jay Z and Akon, can match her enthusiasm and keep her entertained.(n)

programme.title: New Girl
programme.desc: Cece enlists Jess and Reagan to help recruit new models. Comedy, starring Zooey Deschanel, Megan Fox and Hannah Simone.(n)

programme.title: New Girl
programme.desc: Jess and Robby make an unexpected discovery about their relationship. Winston throws a surprise party for Aly, and Schmidt and Cece try to impress their new neighbours.(n)

programme.title: The Goldbergs

programme.title: How I Met Your Mother
programme.desc: Part two of two. In the last-ever episode of the comedy, the friends reunite for Ted's wedding, having seen less of one another recently due to their changing circumstances. programme.title: Baby Daddy
programme.desc: Danny saves the day when Ben and Riley are mugged - but cannot take any of the credit because he is still pretending that he lives in Paris. programme.title: Hollyoaks

Comedy, starring Melissa Joan Hart and Joey Lawrence.(n)

programme.desc: Joe begins dating Candice (Krista Allen), the mother of one of the students he is tutoring, and devises an alternative payment plan for her. programme.title: Baby Daddy
programme.desc: A nervous Danny is offered a cameo role on a popular daytime TV show - and when he charms one of the leading actresses, she decides to make him her new love interest. Tucker and Ben come up with an inventive way to get Bonnie out of their flat and back into her own.(n)

programme.title: Baby Daddy
programme.desc: Bonnie gets depressed about all the losers she has been dating, so Ben and Danny compete to see who can pair her up with the perfect guy. Meanwhile, Riley and Tucker find themselves involved in their neighbour Sondra's marital problems. Starring Jean-Luc Bilodeau.(n)

programme.title: How I Met Your Mother
programme.desc: Marshall tries to get baby Marvin to sleep while they are stuck in traffic during their long journey to Farhampton for the wedding, and devises three rhyming bedtime stories based around the gang's many exploits. American sitcom, guest starring James Van Der Beek.(n)

programme.title: How I Met Your Mother
programme.desc: Barney becomes convinced Robin is planning on throwing him a special wedding rehearsal dinner at the laser tag arena. American sitcom, starring Josh Radnor and Alyson Hannigan.(n)

American sitcom, starring Josh Radnor and Alyson Hannigan.(n)

programme.title: New Girl

programme.desc: While Randy tries to fix his relationship with Max, she and Caroline look for larger space for their dessert bar, so Han sets them up a real estate agent who has a crush on him.(n)

programme.desc: A chance to purchase goods from the comfort of home.(n)

programme.title: Wild Burma: Nature's Lost Kingdom
programme.desc: The team splits up to search for evidence of tigers, with Justine Evans and the scientists heading to the jungle of northern Burma. Gordon Buchanan travels to the forests of the far south, which were once home to a thriving population of the big cat, but as the area has been isolated by war for more than 60 years, little is known about the fate of the animals. Last in the series.(n)

programme.title: Infestation
programme.desc: Documentary examining what happens during an infestation, beginning with the causes of agricultural plagues and pests and the effects they have on the global food supply.(n)

programme.title: Extreme Fishing with Robson Green
programme.desc: The actor braves the wild waters of British Columbia, Canada, to find caviar-rich sturgeon and prize salmon. He then takes part in an angling contest and spends 24 hours on a commercial trawler in the ocean off Vancouver Island.(n)

programme.title: Nature's Great Events
programme.desc: The migration of elephant herds across Botswana's Kalahari Desert during the annual flooding of the Okavango Delta, which turns 4,000 square miles of arid plains into a maze of wetlands, setting the scene for great clashes between animals in search of water. Resourceful elephants make the most of stagnant pools and waterholes guarded by lions, while hippos converge on prime territories to do battle. David Attenborough narrates.(n)

programme.title: Wild China
programme.desc: The series concludes with a visit to the country's eastern seaboard to investigate how the Chinese government is managing environmental concerns while meeting the ever-expanding needs of the population. Among the region's diverse locales lie futuristic cities, seaweed-thatched villages and rugged wetlands that are home to some of the world's rarest animal species. Last in the series.(n)

programme.title: Wild Japan
programme.desc: Documentary exploring the wildlife of rural Japan's mountains, rainforests, beaches and swamps - including bears, raccoons and fiddler crabs.(n)

programme.title: Infestation
programme.desc: Documentary looking at several underwater species that damage the environments they inhabit, including lionfish, jellyfish, algae and the Nile perch, commonly found in Africa.(n)

programme.title: Extreme Fishing with Robson Green
programme.desc: The actor braves the icy Alaskan wilderness to fulfil his lifelong dream of catching a giant salmon. He also learns how to fish on a frozen lake using a nine-pronged spear, before travelling to Seward Harbour on the southern coast of the state to search for cod. Finally, he celebrates Thanksgiving with the residents of Nanwalek, a tribal village of just 300 people.(n)

programme.title: Nature's Great Events
programme.desc: How the growth of phytoplankton along the coastal waters of Alaska and British Columbia attracts a vast array of marine life to feast on billions of herring. Footage includes humpback whales migrating from Hawaii as well as Steller sea lions, dolphins and killer whales that make the long and arduous journey toward the abundant fish, risking malnutrition and attacks from predators along the way. Narrated by David Attenborough. Last in the series.(n)

programme.title: Wild Japan
programme.desc: Documentary exploring the wildlife of rural Japan's mountains, rainforests, beaches and swamps - including bears, raccoons and fiddler crabs.(n)

programme.title: Wild Caribbean
programme.desc: The varied landscape of the tropical islands and the species that inhabit them, from flamingos and four-eyed fish to anteaters and cave-dwelling rodents. The programme also delves deeper to explore the islands' destructive history of volcanic eruptions, dangerous reefs and powerful hurricanes.(n)

programme.title: Tarsier Tails
programme.desc: Apollo is keeping watch over the birthing tree, where Athena and daughter Poppy are about to give birth. Tarsier males should keep away - but Solo has other ideas.(n)

programme.title: Tarsier Tails
programme.desc: At Burnt Rock Tower, eldest son Elai has left home for good. Noah is keen to mate with Kadi but she rejects his advances.(n)

programme.title: Freaks of Nature
programme.desc: A town full of humans, zombies, and vampires living in co-existence are thrust into an all-out war when aliens invade. Now, three teenagers must defeat the newest visitors to restore the peace(n)

Thriller, based on a true story. A brilliant young mathematician is recruited by his professor (Kevin Spacey) to join a crack team of students whose system of card-counting is enabling them to win millions from the casinos of Las Vegas. How long can their winning streak last, however, once a suspicious head of casino security (Laurence Fishburne) makes it his mission to bring an end to their forbidden activities?(n)

programme.title: Clerks
programme.desc: Two New Jersey shop workers spend a day discussing sex, girls, porn and movie trivia, attending a wake and playing rooftop hockey(n)

programme.title: Hot Shots!
programme.desc: A "Top Gun" spoof in which a maverick Air Force pilot is coaxed back into service after giving up military life to live among a tribe of Native Americans. After reenlisting, he's tasked to destroy Iraqi nuclear facilities while dealing with a rival pilot and a manipulative aerospace executive(n)

programme.title: Major League
programme.desc: Baseball comedy following a team of bungling amateurs and over-the-hill athletes through an unexpected winning streak. When a former chorus girl inherits the ownership of the Cleveland Indians from her deceased husband, she deliberately puts together a bad team in an attempt to relocate them to Miami. But, against all odds, the team begins winning matches. A sequel followed in 1994(n)

programme.title: Dodgeball: A True Underdog Story
programme.desc: The film revolves around the rivalry between the owners of a small gym named Average Joe's and Globo-Gym, a big-budget gym located across the street(n)

programme.title: Navy SEALs
programme.desc: This exercise in patriotic, high-tech action centers on a select group of Navy commandos and their battles against a Middle East terrorist group. This particular squadron is led by a pair of rivals: cocky, fiery Hawkins (Charlie Sheen) and stoic, unflappable Curran (Michael Biehn). When an anti-terrorist mission goes awry, allowing an enemy leader to escape with a supply of stolen American missiles, both men are certain that, given another chance, they can redeem themselves and the squad. Their rivalry plays out against a background of high-powered amphibious battles, allowing the film to revel in dangerous stunts and advanced weaponry. Joanne Whalley-Kilmer provides brief romantic relief as a journalist with important information, but the focus remains on the macho interplay between Hawkins and Curran. Co-written by former Navy Seal Chuck Pfarrer (with Gary Goldman), the film presents authentic details about the elite unit, but the bulk of Navy Seals tends to rely on familiar combat film conventions. Viewers seeking rapidly paced action sequences will not be disappointed, though other viewers may be less likely to overlook the predictable storyline and routine characters(n)

programme.title: Men at Work
programme.desc: A pair of garbage workers (Charlie Sheen and Emilio Estevez) are shocked to find the body of a city councilman in one of their trash cans. With help from a supervisor (Keith David), the duo must solve the case and find the man's killer while hiding the body from the cops. Estevez also directed and provided the screenplay for Men at Work(n)

programme.title: In & Out
programme.desc: Life is sweet for high-school English teacher and sports coach Howard Brackett (Kevin Kline); he's still living where he grew up, he has a good relationship with his father (Wilford Brimley) and mother (Debbie Reynolds), he's respected by his community, and he's about to marry Emily (Joan Cusack), his fiancée of three years. Fearing she was about to become an old maid, Emily has shed 75 pounds for the upcoming nuptials. But first, the entire town of Greenleaf, IN, settles in to watch the Academy Award telecast, because young stud star Cameron Drake (Matt Dillon), who attended Greenleaf High, has been nominated for an Oscar. What's more, he wins, and in his acceptance speech, singles out Howard -- and announces his favorite teacher is gay. Everyone in town is thunderstruck, including Howard himself. The media descend on the town, particularly Peter Malloy (Tom Selleck), whose job is hanging by a thread. Even worse, Howard's principal Tom Halliwell (Bob Newhart) is shaken by the news, and is toying with firing Howard. The beleaguered teacher tries to convince everyone (and himself) that he's as straight and macho as the next guy; he even tries to follow the rules on a motivational tape, "Be a Man." But his fondness for Barbra Streisand, his theatrical mannerisms, and the fact that he and Emily have yet to make love make everyone's eyebrows stay permanently raised. Meanwhile, out in Hollywood, Cameron, who's really a decent guy, learns about the problems his impulsive comment has caused, and heads back to Greenleaf to see what he can do to help. Howard's mother is fiercely determined to see at least one of her two sons wed -- Walter (Gregory Jbara), the other, is a doofus -- and as the wedding date draws nearer and nearer, poor Howard's life flies even farther out of control(n)

programme.title: Major League
programme.desc: Baseball comedy following a team of bungling amateurs and over-the-hill athletes through an unexpected winning streak. When a former chorus girl inherits the ownership of the Cleveland Indians from her deceased husband, she deliberately puts together a bad team in an attempt to relocate them to Miami. But, against all odds, the team begins winning matches. A sequel followed in 1994(n)

programme.title: Mystic Pizza
programme.desc: Engaging coming-of-age study about the romantic entanglements of three young women at a pizzeria(n)

programme.title: Some Kind of Wonderful
programme.desc: In a gender-reversed version of his previous hit Pretty in Pink, John Hughes retreads all-too- familiar ground in Some Kind of Wonderful, the story of a sensitive, young would-be artist, Keith (Eric Stoltz), who vies for the affection of his high school's popularity queen, Amanda (Lea Thompson), seemingly out of some deep-rooted insecurity regarding his social ineptitude. He enlists the help of his butch best friend and fellow misfit, Watts (Mary Stuart Masterson), unaware that she secretly pines for him. While she goads him to give up his pointless pursuit of Amanda, he encounters one other small obstacle -- Amanda's rich bully of a boyfriend, Hardy (Craig Sheffer), who threatens Keith with a face rearrangement. Undeterred, Keith decides he will, by any means necessary, escort his dream girl to the prom -- but not before he buys her expensive jewelry with the money from his college fund in order to impress her. (Hughes expects the audience to side with Keith when his father protests.) Some Kind of Wonderful is pure fantasy, but the plot is too tired and flawed for it to be completely satisfactory escapism. Still, the performances are all-around good and the ending is slightly more likeable than its predecessor's. Hughes decided to use the original Pretty in Pink ending, which had been dropped from the original after poor audience response at the advance screenings(n)

programme.title: Wet Hot American Summer
programme.desc: It's 1981 and the last day at a Maine summer camp, where both the counselors and the campers are looking for a good time.This hilarious spoof of the summer-camp films of the '70s and '80s features Janeane Garofalo as the chief counselor and David Hyde Pierce as the object of her affection. Written by Michael Showalter and David Wain of the sketch comedy The State. Paul Rudd, Molly Shannon, Amy Poehler, Christopher Meloni(n)

programme.title: Clerks
programme.desc: Two New Jersey shop workers spend a day discussing sex, girls, porn and movie trivia, attending a wake and playing rooftop hockey(n)

programme.title: The Walk
programme.desc: In this drama based on a true story, tightrope walker Philippe Petit crosses back and forth between the Twin Towers in 1974. Petit works to accomplish this feat while dealing with logistical problems and the concern of his loved ones(n)

Still, the performances are all-around good and the ending is slightly more likeable than its predecessor's. Hughes decided to use the original Pretty in Pink ending, which had been dropped from the original after poor audience response at the advance screenings(n)

programme.title: Mystic Pizza
programme.desc: Engaging coming-of-age study about the romantic entanglements of three young women at a pizzeria(n)

programme.title: Dodgeball: A True Underdog Story
programme.desc: The film revolves around the rivalry between the owners of a small gym named Average Joe's and Globo-Gym, a big-budget gym located across the street(n)

programme.title: Inside Out
programme.desc: Emotions run wild in the mind of a little girl who is uprooted from her peaceful life in the Midwest and forced to move to San Francisco in this Pixar adventure from director Pete Docter (Up, Monsters Inc.). Young Riley was perfectly content with her life when her father landed a new job in San Francisco, and the family moved across the country. Now, as Riley prepares to navigate a new city and attend a new school, her emotional headquarters becomes a hot bed of activity. As Joy (voice of Amy Poehler) attempts to keep Riley feeling happy and positive about the move, other emotions like Fear (voice of Bill Hader), Anger (voice of Lewis Black), Disgust (voice of Mindy Kaling) and Sadness (Phyllis Smith) make the transition a bit more complicated(n)

programme.title: Nothing Like the Holidays
programme.desc: Puerto Rican siblings reunite for Christmas amid the impending divorce of their parents(n)

programme.title: Wet Hot American Summer
programme.desc: It's 1981 and the last day at a Maine summer camp, where both the counselors and the campers are looking for a good time.This hilarious spoof of the summer-camp films of the '70s and '80s features Janeane Garofalo as the chief counselor and David Hyde Pierce as the object of her affection. Written by Michael Showalter and David Wain of the sketch comedy The State. Paul Rudd, Molly Shannon, Amy Poehler, Christopher Meloni(n)

programme.title: Idiocracy
programme.desc: Private Joe Bauers, the definition of "average American", is selected by the Pentagon to be the guinea pig for a top-secret hibernation program. Forgotten, he awakes 500 years in the future. He discovers a society so incredibly dumbed-down that he's easily the most intelligent person alive(n)

programme.title: Some Kind of Wonderful
programme.desc: In a gender-reversed version of his previous hit Pretty in Pink, John Hughes retreads all-too- familiar ground in Some Kind of Wonderful, the story of a sensitive, young would-be artist, Keith (Eric Stoltz), who vies for the affection of his high school's popularity queen, Amanda (Lea Thompson), seemingly out of some deep-rooted insecurity regarding his social ineptitude. He enlists the help of his butch best friend and fellow misfit, Watts (Mary Stuart Masterson), unaware that she secretly pines for him. While she goads him to give up his pointless pursuit of Amanda, he encounters one other small obstacle -- Amanda's rich bully of a boyfriend, Hardy (Craig Sheffer), who threatens Keith with a face rearrangement. Undeterred, Keith decides he will, by any means necessary, escort his dream girl to the prom -- but not before he buys her expensive jewelry with the money from his college fund in order to impress her. (Hughes expects the audience to side with Keith when his father protests.) Some Kind of Wonderful is pure fantasy, but the plot is too tired and flawed for it to be completely satisfactory escapism. Still, the performances are all-around good and the ending is slightly more likeable than its predecessor's. Hughes decided to use the original Pretty in Pink ending, which had been dropped from the original after poor audience response at the advance screenings(n)

programme.title: Inside Out
programme.desc: Emotions run wild in the mind of a little girl who is uprooted from her peaceful life in the Midwest and forced to move to San Francisco in this Pixar adventure from director Pete Docter (Up, Monsters Inc.). Young Riley was perfectly content with her life when her father landed a new job in San Francisco, and the family moved across the country. Now, as Riley prepares to navigate a new city and attend a new school, her emotional headquarters becomes a hot bed of activity. As Joy (voice of Amy Poehler) attempts to keep Riley feeling happy and positive about the move, other emotions like Fear (voice of Bill Hader), Anger (voice of Lewis Black), Disgust (voice of Mindy Kaling) and Sadness (Phyllis Smith) make the transition a bit more complicated(n)

programme.title: For Love of the Game
programme.desc: Romantic drama about a washed-up baseball player who, on the morning of the final game of the season, finds out that his girlfriend is leaving to live in London and his team's new owners plan to trade him. As he pitches for the last time, he is torn - in a series of flashbacks - between the game he adores and the woman he loves(n)

programme.title: The Ghost and the Darkness
programme.desc: Adventure drama about the confrontation between two Europeans and a pair of lions that are obstructing the progress of a railway line in East Africa during the 1890s. When the labourers become so frightened by recurring lion attacks at their campsite that they are reluctant to continue to work, an engineer and a big-game hunter join forces in an attempt to outwit the predators(n)

programme.title: Friday the 13th
programme.desc: A children's summer camp, closed for two years because of gruesome murders, is reopened; but it is clear that the killing spree is not over(n)

programme.title: Friday the 13th, Part II
programme.desc: Two months after the events of the original Friday the 13th, Alice (Adrienne King), the lone survivor or Mrs. Vorhees' killing spree, meets a grisly end in her city apartment. Five years later, a new group of co-eds converges near Camp Crystal Lake, scene of the original massacre and the drowning of Jason Vorhees that preceded it. This time around, the horny collegians attend a nearby training school for camp counselors. As half the group parties in town, an unseen assailant picks off the other half one by one. Only when camp leader Paul (John Furey) and his girlfriend, Ginny (Amy Steel), return to camp do they uncover the identity of their stalker -- none other than Jason (Warrington Gillette) himself, alive but grotesquely deformed as a result of his childhood drowning. Flashbacks chronicle Jason's behind-the-scenes activities in the first film (perhaps explaining how his mother was able to throw the dead bodies of muscular youths through windows with such apparent ease). The young couple's only hope to defeat the fiend lies in psych major Ginny's insights in Jason's mental state(n)

programme.title: Rapid Fire
programme.desc: An art student accidentally witnesses a drug murder and suddenly finds himself entangled in a war between two powerful drug lords(n)

programme.title: Lord of Illusions
programme.desc: Horror tale about a detective trying to get to the bottom of a mystery. New York private eye Harry D0092Amour takes on a routine case which turns ominous when he stumbles upon a mystery involving the world famous illusionist, Philip Swann and his beautiful wife, Dorothea. When a tragedy occurs at one of Swann0092s magic shows, Harry is drawn towards a whirlpool of deceit and unimaginable terrors. As he begins to fall in love with Dorothea, he comes face-to-face with Nix, the diabolic power which gave Swann his dark magic(n)

programme.title: Mobsters
programme.desc: In this fictionalized account based on true figures, a foursome of young thugs decides to team up and take control of New York's east side from the aging bosses who control it. Bugsy Siegel (Richard Grieco) and Frank Costello (Costas Mandylor) control the physical elements of the operation, while Lucky Luciano (Christian Slater) and Meyer Lansky (Patrick Dempsey) bring up the business end(n)

programme.title: Speed 2: Cruise Control
programme.desc: Annie has just about put her bomb-on-a-bus past behind her, and tries to enjoy a romantic cruise with new boyfriend Alex. Little do they know there is a psychopath on board, planning to blow the ship to smithereens in order to steal a wealth of diamonds on board. Action(n)

programme.title: Godzilla Against Mechagodzilla
programme.desc: Director Masaaki Tezuka follows up his debut feature Godzilla vs. Megaguirus with another movie starring everyone's favorite giant lizard. One of at least three films in the history of the Godzilla franchise to find the merciless reptile pitted against his mechanical counterpart, Godzilla x Mechagodzilla finds humans under attack by the green beast. With little hope left, they build the giant man-piloted robot Mechagodzilla to defend the world. This film was also released under the titles Godzilla Against Mechagodzilla and Gojira x Mekagojira. Tezuka's next film, Godzilla x Mothra x Mechagodzilla: Tokyo S.O.S. upped ante even further, with the addition of Mothra into the mix(n)

programme.title: Bulletproof Monk
programme.desc: Martial arts comedy, based on the comic book strip of the same name, in which a Tibetan monk enlists the help of a pickpocket in order to protect an immortality-giving scroll from a new generation of Nazis(n)

programme.title: Kung Fu Hustle
programme.desc: Director Stephen Chow made his name in this country with the deliriously wonderful Shaolin Soccer and Kung Fu Hustle continues his love of comedy kung-fu films. Set in pre-revolutionary China, Chow plays Sing, a street hustler who makes the mistake of pretending to be a member of the notorious Axe gang. He becomes caught up in a war between the gang and the residents of Pig Sty Alley, which the gang want to take over. Little do they know that two of the Alley's residents are retired martial arts experts and soon the fists and feet are flying in knockabout fights that owe as much to Kill Bill (some of the wire work is done by Yuen Wo Ping, who worked on Tarantino's film) as they do to classic Hollywood silent comedies. Film fans can enjoy Chow's references to films ranging from Top Hat to The Shining while the rest can just enjoy a wildly entertaining romp. In Cantonese with English subtitles(n)

programme.title: Way of The Dragon
programme.desc: Martial-arts mayhem with Bruce Lee taking on mobsters in Rome. Chuck Norris, Nora Miao. Wang: Huang Chung Hsun. Ah K'ung: Chin Ti. Boss: Jon T. Benn. Robert: Robert Wall. Lee also directed(n)

Bugsy Siegel (Richard Grieco) and Frank Costello (Costas Mandylor) control the physical elements of the operation, while Lucky Luciano (Christian Slater) and Meyer Lansky (Patrick Dempsey) bring up the business end(n)

programme.title: In Too Deep
programme.desc: An undercover cop becomes too close to an Ohio drug lord, ultimately endangering the police operation(n)

programme.desc: A Cup a Joe. A restaurateur wants a mom-and-pop diner, knowing its value will skyrocket with the new freeway off-ramp he's arranged. Hannibal: George Peppard. Cactus Jack Slater: John Ashton. Patty: Lisa Denton. Murdock: Dwight Schultz(n)

programme.title: Game of Death
programme.desc: In his final film (one completed after his death with a number of cinematic tricks), Bruce Lee stars as a famous martial artist who has faced many enemies, but to give himself time to plan his revenge, he fakes his own death(n)

programme.title: Supercross
programme.desc: Two siblings find themselves competing on and off the racetrack in this action-packed drama. K.C. Carlyle (Steve Howey) and his kid brother, Trip (Mike Vogel), are both racers in the rough and tumble world of supercross, a revved-up variation on motocross racing in which specially modified motorcycle negotiate specially built dirt tracks that send riders through tricky twists and turns, over rough terrain, and off high-flying jumps. Both are talented racers, but K.C. has a wilder and more reckless approach, while Trip follows a more cautious path. A more profound difference between them arises when K.C. is offered a lucrative deal to ride for a factory-sponsored team; he takes the deal, and leaves his brother behind to race on his own dime. However, when an accident takes Trip out of the running on the supercross circuit, he and K.C. set aside their differences as Trip helps coach his older brother so he can succeed in his drive to the championship. Made with the cooperation of a leading supercross race promoter, Supercross: The Movie also stars Sophia Bush and Cameron Richardson as the brothers' love interests, and Robert Carradine as a determined race coach(n)

programme.desc: Kevin Smith steps his foot into horror territory with this politically tinged fright flick about a controversial Fred Phelps-ish reverend who brings his own brand of zealotry to a wayward group of teens(n)

programme.desc: Tense thriller based on a play starring Forest Whitaker, Sherilyn Fenn, James Belushi, Sharon Stone. the longer a hitman waits, the harder the hit becomes(n)

programme.desc: A pair of old friends scheme to rob an armored car company with a cop hot on their tail in this crime drama from director Dito Montiel. Liam Hemsworth and Dwayne Johnson star in the Emmet/Furla Films production(n)

programme.title: Monk
programme.desc: Adrian suspects a kung-fu film star of murdering his biographer - but the man is ruled out of Stottlemeyer's investigation by evidence suggesting he died six years previously. Mystery drama, guest starring Mako (Samurai Jack), with Tony Shalhoub and Ted Levine.(n)

programme.title: The Mentalist
programme.desc: Jane is called to the scene of a fireman's death, but is knocked unconscious while searching for the murder weapon and almost drowns in a pond, which causes him to lose his memory and revert to his former con-artist self. Rigsby takes him under his wing, convinced the only way to get him firing on all cylinders again is to bring him back into the CBI fold. Crime drama, starring Simon Baker and Owain Yeoman.(n)

programme.title: The Mentalist
programme.desc: A lawyer is killed in an explosion on his boat, leaving the team to find out that he was accused of cheating by a mob boss, so Cho goes undercover at one of the criminal's gaming nights to see what he can learn. Back at CBI headquarters, FBI Agent Darcy has been assigned to re-examine the case of serial killer Panzer, but Jane believes her life is in danger when Red John sends them doctored footage of her. Crime drama, guest starring Catherine Dent and Rudolf Martin, with Simon Baker.(n)

programme.title: The Mentalist
programme.desc: The FBI's investigation into the death of Van Pelt's fiance comes to an end, just in time for her to help investigate the murder of a mob boss's son, who was killed while celebrating the prospect of taking control of the business from his ailing father. While Jane and the others focus their inquiries on the rest of the crime family, Grace takes the only witness in for interrogation, but is distracted by her own problems, and forced into a game of cat-and-mouse against a determined assassin. Drama, starring Amanda Righetti.(n)

programme.title: The Mentalist
programme.desc: Jane and Lisbon investigate the murder of an out-of-favour fashion designer who was planning to revitalise his career by launching a new clothing line, but first have to track down the man employed to make the outfits. Darcy continues to re-examine the Panzer case, talking to a blind woman who was friends with Red John - only for her to reveal the serial killer is still alive. Crime drama, starring Simon Baker and Robin Tunney.(n)

programme.title: The Closer
programme.desc: The pressure is on for Brenda and her team to solve the murder of a police detective, but as evidence points to one of their own, the Deputy Police Chief struggles to match DNA samples that could prove their case. However, it becomes clear Gabriel and Daniels' relationship to the victim is key to understanding the crime. Drama, starring Kyra Sedgwick.(n)

programme.title: The Closer
programme.desc: When a juror dies during the trial of a Mob boss, Brenda has her work cut out questioning the remainder of the jury, while an unannounced visit puts her plans with Fritz on hold. Detective drama, starring Kyra Sedgwick and Jon Tenney.(n)

programme.title: The Closer
programme.desc: Brenda investigates the murders of three college students, apparently caught in the middle of a gang shootout. It transpires that one of the youngsters was the son of people known to Taylor. The detective also tries to keep her relationship with Fritz under wraps while her mother remains in town. Detective drama, with Kyra Sedgwick, Robert Gossett and Jon Tenney.(n)

programme.title: The Closer
programme.desc: As Brenda's 40th birthday approaches, she investigates the high-profile case of a woman who was murdered at one of Los Angeles' trendiest restaurants. Detective drama, starring Kyra Sedgwick.(n)

programme.title: NCIS
programme.desc: The murder of a port authority officer reveals Parsa's possible whereabouts as the team continues the hunt for the terrorist intent on wiping out NCIS. Bishop reveals her past association with the quarry and suggests where she thinks he may be found, but the CIA has intercepted a call that places Parsa in a different location to Ellie's hunch. Mark Harmon and Emily Wickersham star.(n)

programme.title: NCIS
programme.desc: The team uncovers faulty bulletproof vests in an abandoned truck filled with stolen USMC merchandise, and attempts to locate the source of the cargo and any vests that could have been sent to military personnel overseas. Crime drama, guest starring Challen Cates, with Mark Harmon.(n)

programme.title: NCIS
programme.desc: DiNozzo confronts a man impersonating a Navy officer, which results in guns being drawn, and the only eyewitness to the case is the Special Agent's father - who is in town to disclose a secret to his son. The 250th episode of the crime drama, starring Mark Harmon and Michael Weatherly.(n)

programme.title: NCIS
programme.desc: A bomb detonates at a military charity concert, killing two men. Called to investigate, Tony and McGee try to determine whether the intended target was the 1980s rocker headlining the act or if the attack was part of a larger scheme against the military. Meanwhile, Jimmy prepares for parenthood. Keith Carradine guest stars, with Mark Harmon and Pauley Perrette.(n)

programme.title: Family Guy
programme.desc: Brian's luck as a writer changes dramatically when Stewie becomes his manager, and one of his books hits the bestseller list. However, fame soon goes to his head, and it takes a wake-up call from satirist Bill Maher to bring him to his senses. Comedy, featuring the voices of Mila Kunis and Seth Green.(n)

programme.title: Family Guy
programme.desc: Peter suffers kidney failure after drinking kerosene and is told he needs a transplant. Luckily, Brian is a match and offers one of his, but concerns are raised that a canine organ might not be suitable. Meanwhile, Meg and Chris collaborate on a poem for an important visitor.(n)

programme.title: American Dad
programme.desc: Stan creates attractive alter ego Phyllis in a desperate bid to bond with his son, but when he takes things too far, Francine is forced to intervene. Elsewhere, a group of men takes advantage of Roger's new limousine service, prompting him to set out on a manhunt to exact revenge. With the guest voices of Sarah Michelle Gellar and Patrick Stewart.(n)

programme.title: American Dad
programme.desc: A jealous Francine tries to break up Stan's renewed relationship with a former girlfriend, only to unwittingly leave Roger at the mercy of an alien-hunter. Elsewhere, Steve accidentally wears Hayley's panties to school, and finds they bring him luck.(n)

programme.title: Family Guy
programme.desc: Peter is struck by lightning and hovers on the brink of death. In his state of limbo he experiences flashbacks that make him realise he should pay more attention to his beloved wife. At the same time, he agrees to arrange a date for Death with the girl from the pet shop. Peter Frampton guest stars.(n)

programme.title: Family Guy
programme.desc: Lois becomes a martial arts expert and puts her new-found skills to use by chasing away tourists watching the leaves fall in Quahog. Unfortunately her zeal for combat soon infects the entire Griffin household, leading to an all-out family brawl.(n)

programme.title: American Dad
programme.desc: Stan becomes jealous when he discovers Francine was once engaged to a pilot whose plane crashed. However, it emerges his wife's would-be husband survived the incident, and the envious spy enlists Roger's help to track him down.(n)

programme.title: American Dad
programme.desc: Steve dons a mask and takes revenge on the popular girls at his school for humiliating his girlfriend Debbie. When his identity is exposed, he is forced to flee from an angry mob along with his friends. With the guest voice of Lizzy Caplan.(n)

programme.title: Family Guy
programme.desc: Part two of two. Brian moves into his cousin Jasper's Hollywood apartment and tries to start a career in screenwriting. Things are slow taking off, and he spends some time washing cars and working as a waiter to make ends meet. When his break finally comes, it is not quite what he had in mind.(n)

programme.title: Family Guy
programme.desc: Peter becomes the president of a cigarette company that uses toy products to promote smoking among children. Lois initially urges him to take a stand against the policy - but the perks of his new job soon persuade her to drop her opposition.(n)

programme.title: American Dad
programme.desc: The Smiths are unaware Roger plans to become `king of spring break' by inviting students to party at their home. Meanwhile, Steve tries to lose his virginity and Stan is attracted to a vivacious new friend.(n)

programme.title: American Dad
programme.desc: On Roger's 1,600th birthday, Steve announces he is going through puberty. With Hayley's transition still fresh in the memory, Stan plots to avert any trouble caused by his son's raging hormones.(n)

programme.title: Family Guy
programme.sub-title: One If by Clam, Two If by Sea.
programme.desc: A hurricane sweeps through Quahog and damages the Drunken Clam - which is then bought at a knock-down price by an opportunistic expat Brit who angers the locals by turning it into an English-themed pub. Meanwhile, Stewie tries to teach the new landlord's three-year-old daughter how to speak proper English.(n)

programme.title: Family Guy
programme.desc: Meg tries to get friendly with the in-crowd at school, but becomes the target of their cruel mockery. Peter competes against Chris in a variety of winter pursuits, including a skating race and the unusual `kitchenware on face and head' contest - but there is a surprise in store for him.(n)

programme.title: American Dad
programme.desc: Roger believes his identity has been stolen when his credit card unexpectedly reaches its limit, and sets out to catch the criminal. However, after a few days of playing detective, he realises things are not quite what they seem. Animated comedy, with the voices of Seth MacFarlane and Wendy Schaal.(n)

programme.title: American Dad
programme.desc: Stan gets a new position as his boss's adviser and is delighted to accommodate his every request. However, the job begins to threaten his personal life and Francine is roped in to help complete an outrageous task, ruining her plans to spend Valentine's Day with her husband.(n)

programme.title: Teleshopping
programme.desc: Buying goods from the comfort of home.(n)

programme.title: Monk
programme.desc: Mobsters set their sights on killing Adrian to ensure he does not testify at a forthcoming trial - so the FBI takes him into protective custody at an isolated cabin, where he whiles away the time by trying to solve the murder of a neighbour. Tony Shalhoub stars.(n)

programme.title: The Mentalist
programme.desc: The FBI's investigation into the death of Van Pelt's fiance comes to an end, just in time for her to help investigate the murder of a mob boss's son, who was killed while celebrating the prospect of taking control of the business from his ailing father. While Jane and the others focus their inquiries on the rest of the crime family, Grace takes the only witness in for interrogation, but is distracted by her own problems, and forced into a game of cat-and-mouse against a determined assassin. Drama, starring Amanda Righetti.(n)

programme.title: The Mentalist
programme.desc: Jane and Lisbon investigate the murder of an out-of-favour fashion designer who was planning to revitalise his career by launching a new clothing line, but first have to track down the man employed to make the outfits. Darcy continues to re-examine the Panzer case, talking to a blind woman who was friends with Red John - only for her to reveal the serial killer is still alive. Crime drama, starring Simon Baker and Robin Tunney.(n)

programme.title: The Mentalist
programme.desc: A woman looks set to be convicted of murdering her dance teacher, but Jane believes she is innocent after watching her give a press conference. He tries to prove she is not the killer before the jury's verdict is read out in court - so he announces that footage has been found of the crime taking place and waits to see who takes the bait. Crime drama, guest starring Ian Kahn, Diane Farr and James Frain, with Simon Baker.(n)

programme.title: The Mentalist
programme.desc: A woman convicted of murdering her husband is given permission to leave jail for a few days to help Jane track down a former charity worker's killer, and they learn the philanthropist the victim once worked for is not as benevolent as he seems. However, as the case progresses, the consultant's new partner uses her charms to try to fool him and make a bid for her freedom. Crime drama, guest starring Morena Baccarin (Homeland), with Simon Baker.(n)

programme.title: The Closer
programme.desc: Brenda investigates the murders of three college students, apparently caught in the middle of a gang shootout. It transpires that one of the youngsters was the son of people known to Taylor. The detective also tries to keep her relationship with Fritz under wraps while her mother remains in town. Detective drama, with Kyra Sedgwick, Robert Gossett and Jon Tenney.(n)

programme.title: The Closer
programme.desc: As Brenda's 40th birthday approaches, she investigates the high-profile case of a woman who was murdered at one of Los Angeles' trendiest restaurants. Detective drama, starring Kyra Sedgwick.(n)

programme.title: The Closer
programme.desc: The body of a woman is found in Provenza's garage, forcing Brenda to become involved in a cover-up of her own. The detective struggles to protect members of her team, who find themselves racing against the clock before the LAPD finds out what they are up to. Drama, starring Kyra Sedgwick and GW Bailey.(n)

programme.title: The Closer
programme.desc: The detectives investigate the death of a paparazzo, who appears to have killed himself by jumping out of a hotel window. They discover a popular celebrity may have been the target of the photographer's prying camera. Meanwhile, calls from a female colleague to Fritz stir up feelings of jealousy in Brenda. Drama, starring Kyra Sedgwick.(n)

programme.title: NCIS
programme.desc: DiNozzo confronts a man impersonating a Navy officer, which results in guns being drawn, and the only eyewitness to the case is the Special Agent's father - who is in town to disclose a secret to his son. The 250th episode of the crime drama, starring Mark Harmon and Michael Weatherly.(n)

programme.title: NCIS
programme.desc: A bomb detonates at a military charity concert, killing two men. Called to investigate, Tony and McGee try to determine whether the intended target was the 1980s rocker headlining the act or if the attack was part of a larger scheme against the military. Meanwhile, Jimmy prepares for parenthood. Keith Carradine guest stars, with Mark Harmon and Pauley Perrette.(n)

programme.title: NCIS
programme.desc: Part one of two. Gibbs joins forces with the FBI when the body of a congressman and former agent washes ashore in New Orleans. Together they try to determine if the murder could be linked to a well-known case the victim had previously worked on during his career. Crime drama, starring Mark Harmon, David McCallum, Cote de Pablo and Pauley Perrette.(n)

programme.title: NCIS
programme.desc: Part two of two. DiNozzo, McGee and the FBI continue to track political connections to a case, and Bishop sends DiNozzo a souvenir. Meanwhile, Gibbs and Special Agent Pride chase leads in New Orleans after evidence points to a copycat killer. Starring Mark Harmon, David McCallum, Pauley Perrette and Scott Bakula.(n)

programme.title: American Dad
programme.desc: Fr Donovan organises a Christmas play at the shopping centre, and casts Stan as Santa Claus and Roger as Jesus - but they land themselves in trouble after getting into a fight with each other. Elsewhere, Hayley and Jeff adopt a child, who turns out to be possessed.(n)

programme.title: American Dad
programme.desc: Steve tries to prove his toughness to Stan by adopting the persona of a superhero, while Francine also goes through an identity crisis when she receives news that could change the family for ever.(n)

programme.desc: Déjà Vu Man. In the Season 4 premiere, the Chances want to know why a mysterious Natesville resident keeps showing up in their lives, but it leads to a revelation from Maw Maw about Virginia's past(n)

programme.title: Raising Hope
programme.desc: Burt Bucks. Sabrina saves Jimmy's life, but it makes him wonder about his masculinity. Meanwhile, Burt and Virginia learn a painful economics lesson after introducing a new bartering system to Natesville that could be mistaken for a pyramid scheme(n)

programme.title: Parks and Recreation
programme.sub-title: How a Bill Becomes a Law
programme.desc: How a Bill Becomes a Law. Leslie helps a local swim team get more practice time by working on a new law that extends the hours at the community pool; Ron finds himself filling a pothole for a local woman as part of Chris' new plan to solve citizens' problems around the city; April and Ben take a road trip to Pawnee(n)

programme.title: Parks and Recreation
programme.desc: Sex Education. Leslie responds to an STD outbreak among Pawnee seniors by conducting her own sex-education class. At the same time, Tom finds himself gadget-less and turning to Ron for help coping with life without technology; and Ben and April have their first encounter with Congressman Murray(n)

programme.title: The Boy Next Door
programme.desc: A lonely, recently divorced teacher has an affair with a much-younger man. However, their relationship takes a terrifying turn as he grows obsessed with her(n)

programme.title: Contraband
programme.desc: Retired smuggler Chris Farraday (Mark Wahlberg) faces ruthless drug lords, vicious criminals, corrupt officials and trigger-happy hit men after he gets back into the business to help his desperate brother-in-law settle a debt(n)

programme.title: 47 Ronin
programme.desc: A "half-breed" warrior assembles a band of wandering samurai to take revenge on the warlord who killed their master, battling powerful witches and fierce mythical creatures on his quest for justice(n)

programme.title: Project Almanac
programme.desc: A time-traveling teenager uses an almanac to get rich, but his actions have dire consequences in this thought-provoking sci-fi thriller(n)

programme.title: The Simpsons
programme.desc: Mommie Beerest. When Moe's is shut down by the health department, Homer takes out a second mortgage - without consulting Marge - to finance the bar's return. Marge finds out and gets involved in the business and, along the way, she and Moe become great friends. Or could they be more than just friends?(n)

programme.title: The Simpsons
programme.desc: The Wettest Stories Ever Told. When dinner at the Frying Dutchman turns ugly, the Simpsons try to salvage the evening by taking turns telling tales of tragedies at sea(n)

programme.title: The Simpsons
programme.desc: Springfield Up. Mr Burns' hounds get to stretch their legs after Homer 'borrows' his boss's summer mansion in order to fool documentary maker Eric Idle into thinking he's a millionaire(n)

programme.title: The Simpsons
programme.desc: That 90s Show. Flashbacks follow Marge and Homer back to their dating days, when she was a college student and he was working for his father to support her. Then Marge becomes smitten with a professor, so a sorrowful Homer turns to music---and invents grunge. Kurt Loder and "Weird Al" Yankovic have cameos as themselves(n)

programme.title: The Simpsons
programme.desc: Bull-E. Bart gets bullied at a school dance, prompting Marge to lobby the town to pass an extremely tough anti-bullying law. But things backfire when Homer gets arrested for picking on Ned Flanders(n)

programme.title: The Simpsons
programme.desc: Simprovised. Homer takes a stab at improv comedy to regain his confidence and improve his public-speaking skills after messing up a speech in work and Marge rebuilds Bart's shoddy treehouse, but he throws a wrench into the project when he questions her construction abilities. At the end of the episode, Homer answers questions from fans(n)

programme.title: The Simpsons
programme.desc: Gone Maggie Gone. When Maggie goes missing outside a convent, Lisa disguises herself as a nun and sets out to find her. In the process, the school swot digs up Springfield's secrets..(n)

programme.title: The Simpsons
programme.desc: Thursdays with Abie. Grampa becomes famous when a human-interest columnist publishes his anecdote about serving on a battleship in World War II that was struck by a torpedo(n)

programme.title: Archer
programme.desc: Drastic Voyage: Part II. The conclusion of the Season 6 finale sees the end of the gang's most incredible voyage(n)

programme.title: Archer
programme.desc: The Figgis Agency. In the seventh season premiere, Archer breaks into a mansion to repair a Hollywood starlet's honour(n)

programme.title: BSL Zone
programme.desc: Documentary that follows the Deafinitely Theatre as it translates A Midsummer Night's Dream into BSL and prepares for a career defining performance at Shakespeare's Globe.(n)

programme.title: Rio Grande
programme.desc: A cavalry officer has to avoid showing preferential treatment when the son he has not seen for 15 years is posted to his fort as a cadet. His estranged wife also turns up wanting to take the boy away, but he is forced to put duty before his family when called on to rescue children kidnapped by Apaches on the Mexican border. John Ford's Western, with John Wayne, Maureen O'Hara, Ben Johnson and J Carrol Naish.(n)

programme.title: Sherlock Holmes: Terror By Night
programme.desc: The legendary sleuth and his faithful sidekick Dr Watson hunt for the killer of an aristocrat who hired them to keep a priceless diamond out of the hands of thieves. Mystery, starring Basil Rathbone, Nigel Bruce, Alan Mowbray, Dennis Hoey and Mary Forbes.(n)

programme.title: First Men in the Moon
programme.desc: An eccentric Victorian inventor discovers a strange material that defies gravity and uses it to build the world's first spaceship. Leading an expedition to the moon, he is astonished to discover it is inhabited by giant ants and caterpillar-like creatures. Sci-fi adventure based on HG Wells' novel, starring Lionel Jeffries, Edward Judd, Martha Hyer and Miles Malleson, with special effects by Ray Harryhausen.(n)

programme.title: The Colditz Story
programme.desc: A medieval castle in Germany is turned into a PoW camp during the Second World War, and used to house the most rebellious Allied prisoners, all of whom have made repeated escape attempts. Although breaking out is supposedly impossible, the determined inmates refuse to be beaten and continue their bid for freedom. Second World War drama, starring John Mills and Eric Portman.(n)

programme.title: A League of Their Own
programme.desc: An alcoholic former professional player reluctantly agrees to train an all-female baseball team during the Second World War. With star player Dottie Hinson and her sister Kit on board, they look set to dominate the league - until sibling rivalry rears its head. Comedy drama, starring Geena Davis, Lori Petty, Tom Hanks and Madonna.(n)

programme.title: X-Men: First Class
programme.desc: Telepathic mutant Charles Xavier forms the first generation of the superhero team in the 1960s. Their battle with a Nazi war criminal manipulating the world toward nuclear war gradually drives a wedge between Xavier and his ally Magneto, leading them to become deadly enemies. Superhero adventure prequel, starring James McAvoy, Michael Fassbender and Jennifer Lawrence.(n)

programme.title: Nymphomaniac: Volume I
programme.desc: A woman is found beaten in an alley by a stranger, who brings her home. She spends the night with him, and recounts the story of her sexual history and the darker experiences her search for satisfaction has led to. Part one of Lars von Trier's two-part drama, starring Charlotte Gainsbourg, Stellan Skarsgard and Stacy Martin.(n)

programme.title: Summer in February
programme.desc: Painter AJ Munnings goes to live in a bohemian commune on the Cornish coast at the turn of the 20th century. He is drawn into a love triangle with a fellow artist and a land agent in charge of the estate while around them Europe edges towards the outbreak of the First World War. Period drama, starring Dominic Cooper, Emily Browning and Dan Stevens.(n)

programme.title: The Gunfighter
programme.desc: Gunslinger Jimmy Ringo looks forward to a life of domestic peace after being given a chance to settle down with his once estranged wife and their child. However, a young upstart with dreams of slaying a legend challenges Ringo to a gunfight but dies, setting his three vengeful brothers on the older man's trail. Western, starring Gregory Peck, Millard Mitchell, Karl Malden and Helen Westcott.(n)

programme.title: The Mark of Zorro
programme.desc: An aristocratic 19th-century swordsman returns to his native California from Spain to find the people living under the rule of a cruel tyrant. He adopts the guise of a masked avenger, fighting to protect the poor and downtrodden, while playing the foppish nobleman in his day-to-day life to avoid suspicion. Swashbuckling adventure, with Tyrone Power and Basil Rathbone.(n)

programme.title: Beau Geste
programme.desc: Three brothers are accused of stealing from their aristocratic adopted mother. They seek to salvage their honour by joining the foreign legion, battling a rampaging Arab army as well as coming into conflict with their sadistic commanding officer. Action adventure, starring Gary Cooper, Ray Milland, Robert Preston and Brian Donlevy.(n)

programme.title: Guns at Batasi
programme.desc: Rebels besiege the headquarters of a British battalion garrisoned in Africa, enraged by the officers' refusal to give up a prisoner. Meanwhile, the sergeant major struggles to maintain order in his increasingly tense surroundings. Drama, starring Richard Attenborough, Jack Hawkins, Flora Robson and Mia Farrow.(n)

programme.title: Baggage Claim
programme.desc: An air hostess is horrified at the thought of her younger sister getting married while she is still single. She realises her job gives her access to eligible men from across America, and begins clocking up thousands of air miles as she scours the country for a potential fiance. Romantic comedy, with Paula Patton and Taye Diggs.(n)

programme.title: War of the Planet of the Apes Interview Special
programme.desc: Director Matt Reeves and star Andy Serkis talk about making the third film in the series.(n)

programme.title: X-Men: Days of Future Past
programme.desc: In a future ravaged by war, the superhero team makes a desperate last stand against a force of deadly robots. Their only hope is to send Wolverine back in time to the 1970s, to join forces with an earlier version of the X-Men and change the events that started the conflict. Superhero adventure sequel, starring Hugh Jackman, Jennifer Lawrence, James McAvoy and Michael Fassbender.(n)

programme.title: Nymphomaniac: Volume II
programme.desc: A woman continues telling the man who saved her life the unusual story of her sexual history, which now turns to the more recent events of her life and the disturbing incidents that ultimately led to her brush with death. Concluding part of Lars von Trier's drama, starring Charlotte Gainsbourg, Stellan Skarsgard and Stacy Martin.(n)
